definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: By means of high - temperature curing, the curing period of lime - fly ash stabilized bound macadam is shortened.
sentences.chinese: 通过高温养生手段缩短二灰稳定碎石的养生龄期。

sentences.english: To shorten the time, the rapid thermal burn cooking pot is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 若想缩短时间，断热烹调的焖烧锅值得推荐。

sentences.english: We hope to shorten the distance after Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望在星期六之后能缩短距离。

sentences.english: The printing part adopts hanging plate roller, which could shorten the time of plate lock-up.
sentences.chinese: 印刷部采用挂版式版辊，可缩短装版时间。

sentences.english: Limonene shorten the sleeping time induced by sodium pentobarbital.
sentences.chinese: 缩短戊巴比妥钠催眠时间。

sentences.english: Using condensed milk and cream makes for a quicker process.
sentences.chinese: 加入炼乳和奶油会使制作时间缩短。

sentences.english: Its update interval could even be one day.
sentences.chinese: 它的更新间隔甚至缩短到了一天。

sentences.english: Therefore, Dihuang Yinzi could shorten the latency time and increase the number of target quadrant.
sentences.chinese: 地黄饮子能缩短潜伏时间，增加经过目标象限次数。

sentences.english: The second stage of labor should be shortened.
sentences.chinese: 产时适当缩短第二产程。

sentences.english: It kind of short-circuits the pain.
sentences.chinese: 这种药膏可以稍微缩短疼痛的时间。

sentences.english: Ten months on he trimmed four full seconds from his time.
sentences.chinese: 时隔十个月，他的成绩整整缩短了四秒。

sentences.english: The length of laser tube was reduced ten times.
sentences.chinese: 激光管的长度缩短了十分之九。

sentences.english: For safer grilled meats, keep portions small to cut down on grilling time.
sentences.chinese: 为了安全烧烤，将肉切成小块以缩短烤肉时间。

sentences.english: She shortened the skirt by an inch.
sentences.chinese: 她把裙子缩短了一英寸。

sentences.english: Based on reasonable construction plan, shorten construction time 131 days.
sentences.chinese: 通过合理优化施工方案，缩短建井总工期131天。

sentences.english: Don't put the ads will shorten to not stood on tiptoe can see the place.
sentences.chinese: 不要把聚光点缩短到不踮起脚尖就可以看到的地方。

definition: Yanchang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
